glsa.title: OpenTTD: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in OpenTTD could allow a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: OpenTTD is a clone of Transport Tycoon Deluxe.

description.p: The vulnerability is caused due to missing out-of-bound check within the “HandleCrashedAircraft()” function.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenTTD users should upgrade to the latest version:
